Package com.eemi.ext4j.client.data

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BeanModelMarker
    Marker interface that identifies bean model classes indirectly without having to modify the bean.
    BeanModelTag
    Tag interface used to identify Java Beans that may be used to generate BeanModel instances.
    Converter
    Converter that can be used to format the incoming data before processing it by the Reader.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArrayStore  
    BaseModel
    Base class for all data to be displayed in data driven components
    Batch
    Provides a mechanism to run one or more operations in a given order.
    BeanModel
    A ModelData instance that wraps a bean.
    BeanModelFactory
    BeanModelFactores are responsible for creating new BeanModel instances from Java POJOs.
    BeanModelLookup
    Returns BeanModelFactories for java beans.
    BooleanFieldDefinition
    Field that represents boolean data.
    DataModel  
    DateFieldDefinition
    Date field class.
    FieldDefinition  
    FloatFieldDefinition
    Field that represents float data.
    IntegerFieldDefinition
    Field that represents integer data.
    JsonStore
    Small helper class to make creating Store from JSON data easier.
    ModelLocator
    creates BaseModel object out of Java Beans
    NestedModelUtil  
    NodeInterface
    This class is used as a set of methods that are applied to the prototype of a DataModel to decorate it with a Node API.
    Operation
    Represents a single read or write operation performed by a Proxy.
    OperationConfig
    Configuration options for an Operation
    ResutSet
    Simple wrapper class that represents a set of records returned by a Proxy.
    Store
    The Store class encapsulates a client side cache of DataModel objects.
    StringFieldDefinition
    Field that represents String data.
    TableItem
    Base class for all data to be displayed in data driven compoment like list, Dataview.
    TreeStore
    This class is used as a container for a series of nodes.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SortDirection  
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    BeanModelMarker.BEAN
